short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A New Tab page with beautiful places set as background and widgets that inspire you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A New Tab with beautiful places set as background and widgets that inspire you. Customisable widgets that you can choose to add to your new tab. You can also sync it with your mustgo.io account to set your saved places as background.

Widgets you can add:

• Keep track of tasks with Todo list
• See the weather and forecast
• Greeting on Dashboard
• Add NBA scores widget
• Daily quotes from your favourite category
• Add quick links, search box
• Customize the dashboard by showing/hiding widgets
